description.narrative: Campaign is to increase awareness within schools of the needs of ex-Kamaiya children, and encouraging schools to implement policies to ensure ex-Kamaiya child rights are upheld

participating-org.narrative: BASE and WVAF in coordination with government schools,political leaders,school children and teachers

activity-date.narrative: Campaign was for 20 times in each project working district and it is completed in all district.

recipient-country.narrative: for five districts in 41 government schools

sector.narrative: BASE and WVAF with coordination with other relevant line agencies and political bodies of Nepal
